Game Notes

Nicklas bäckström from the Minnesota Wild wins the 2008 YoungStars Most Valuable Player
Mike Keenan (New York Islanders) coached the Eastern YoungStars
Ron Wilson (San Jose) coached the Western YoungStars
Shane O'brien was captain for the Western YoungStars
Travis Zajac was captain for the Eastern YoungStars
